views.markdown: If you need help with "Purity", you can contact hyl1cs, the developer, via e-mail.
hyl1cs is the maintainer of the package "Purity". Please contact them via email for any questions on this version of the package.
If you found a mistake in the depiction or cannot download the package, you can reach out to the maintainer of the "the hyl1cs house" repo, hyl1cs.
